thread.title: Teenage Holly Willoughby squeezes her boobs in saucy 90s lingerie advert
thread.title_full: Teenage Holly Willoughby squeezes her boobs in saucy 90s lingerie advert

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Teenage Holly Willoughby squeezes her boobs in saucy 90s lingerie advert
text:
Teenage Holly Willoughby squeezes her boobs in saucy 90s lingerie advert The underwear modelling video has come to light nearly two decades after Holly filmed it Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Holly Willoughby squeezes boobs in saucy 90s ad Share this video   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Holly Willougby may be best known for her presenting work on This Morning, but she's actually had a long career of TV work and modelling stretching back to when she was a teenager. 
And one of her first ever jobs was a lingerie modelling campaign for Pretty Polly bras, which she filmed for TV in 1998. 
The old advert has resurfaced and shows an 18-year-old Holly giving tongue-in-cheek instructions about how bras work. "I'm a sex goddess!" (Photo: PrettyPolly/Youtube) 
In it, she tosses her blonde-brown curls around and brands herself a "sex goddess" while wearing a while bra and dangling pearl earrings. 
She then stands in what looks like a bathroom mirror and tells the camera: "Don't squeeze them. Lift them." 
A man in a lab coat stands in the bathtub behind her looking on approvingly, as she holds up her boobs with her hands. "Don't squeeze them" (Photo: PrettyPolly/Youtube) 
Later, Holly looks into the camera and dances seductively while touching her bra. 
It's not the only modelling Holly did in her younger years – she also appeared on the covers of teen magazines after being scouted aged 14. 
Holly revealed back in 2013 that she was spotted by a modelling agent during a school trip to the Clothes Show Live in Birmingham, and quickly made a name for herself in front of the camera. "Lift them!" (Photo: PrettyPolly/Youtube) 
This led to her first presenting job for S Club TV and Ministry Of Mayhem, for which she won a BAFTA in 2006, and she's never looked back since. 
She later said: "I appreciate it was down to luck that it happened – modelling is a hard field to break into these days and I'm grateful I never saw the dark side of the industry. It opened a lot of doors for me that I never thought were possible." 
But she has never ruled out doing more modelling in the future, saying after the birth of her daughter Belle in 2011 that she would "never say never". Holly pouts seductively and dances in her Pretty Polly bra (Photo: PrettyPolly/Youtube) 
"When I started as a model I did a lot of lingerie work but it was for Pretty Polly, which is a very safe brand," she told the Daily Mail at the time. 
"It's been less than a year since I had my second baby so I would need some time to get in shape, but I would consider it. Having the time to do all these things is the real problem." Like us on Facebook
